metadata.title: CVE-2020-22679 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Memory leak in the sgpd_parse_entry function in MP4Box in gpac 0.8.0 allowsattackers to cause a denial of service (DoS) via a crafted input.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
